title: Transcending Evolution - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Drama   Fantasy   Martial Arts   School Life   Sci-fi   Tragedy   Xuanhuan
tags: Apocalypse   Artifacts   Betrayal   Body Tempering   Cultivation   Evolution   Magic Beasts   Male Protagonist   Modern Day   Monsters   Special Abilities   Weak to Strong
author: 撒加
description:
A sudden and terrible disaster had struck, completely changing the environment of Earth as they knew it. Plenty of Source Energy spread and opened a path for biological evolution, one that brought superior human beings out of a race on the brink of extinction.

This is the resurgence of a glorious ancient cultivating civilization, where development of science and technology was no longer the theme of daily life. The use of martial arts was no longer a legend, but a must to evolve and to survive.

It is the worst era of natural selection, survival of the fittest; your life at stake.

This is one of the best eras, where the strong have gathered, heroes have risen, and transcendence is not just a dream.

Here, a lonely orphan, left by his parents, is where the legend begins!>
